content.rendered:
Octordle : if You Can, Guess All Eight Wordle Together

Play Octordle Online : Difficult Word Puzzle Like Wordle

What is Octordle?

Octordle is a difficult game in which players must guess eight five-letter words at the same time while only having thirteen guesses!

The Octordle game is a popular spin-off of the legendary Wordle game like Dordle , Quordle and Sedecordle .

Unlike the original Wordle game, you have to guess eight words at the same time. The game is played on an eight field, your words are entered into 8 fields at the same time.

in fact,The game functions similarly to Wordle in that there are no clues to assist you in guessing the words, but once you have guessed a word, the tiles will change colour.

How to Play Octordle?

Now that you’re ready to enter Octordle’s simultaneous word guessing world, let’s see how you can play Octordle, what game modes are offered, and how to solve the 8-cell dilemma in the game guess from your already polished pieces of minced meat.

Octordle : 8 Wordles at once!

if you can Guess all 8 OCTORDLE words in 13 tries.

  • Each guess must be a valid 5 letter word.
  • After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word.

Guess EIGHT Octordle Wordle Game

  • The top left word has none of the letters.
  • The top right word has the G in the wrong spot and the T in the correct spot.
  • The bottom left word has the H in the wrong spot.
  • The bottom right word has the I in the right spot and the T in the wrong spot.
  • You have 13 guesses to get all 8 words correct. Good luck!
  • A new Octordle will be available each day!
  • At the end of the game, the number of guesses per word are displayed as emojis for easy sharing and as a numeric score for the whole game. For example, if 6️⃣ is shown, that board took 6 guesses to find the right word. A ? means 10 guesses were needed to find the right word.

Too smart for Wordle?

Then figuring out today’s Octordle words is probably the next challenge for you. Octordle is a unique spin on Wordle, Dordle, and Quordle Octordle that gives you 13 chances to guess all eight words of the day. Getting them all right means getting no more than five guesses wrong.

Octordle Game Modes

Play octordle of the day : a free online word puzzle game

Daily Octordle : A new octordle each day. This game mode updates daily with a new Octordle (a set of eight 5-letter words) for all players around the world. You get one Octordle to guess per day and this Octordle is the same for every player.

Free Octordle : Octordle provides a method for players to get a hang of its multi-tasking approach before venturing into the world of daily Octordle. This game mode allows players to play as much as they want, each time a new Octordle.

Solving Octordle today

When you’re solving for many — such as 8 words at a time — it is extremely likely that the most common letters are present in several of the words. It’s also very likely that the less common letters are in at least some of them (and the rarest letters, such as Q, X, or Z, may be in one or two).

This changes what it means to cover the broadest range of possibilities. You could still start with TASER or ADIEU, but the information is less useful. What’s more helpful is to aim for those less common (but not rare) letters, so that you have at least one word that you can solve easily in the next guess— ideally using some common letters. That will help you with the remaining words.

Is Octordle available as an app?

As of now, Octordle does not have an app. However, just like other similar games in the Wordle genre, it is possible to create an app icon for Octordle on your Android and iOS devices. Read our detailed guide to know more about the same.
